# Todo

## Misc.
- Download and install Input font family: http://input.fontbureau.com/download/
- Install Liberation Mono

## Sublime
- Install with Package Control
  - Flatland: https://packagecontrol.io/packages/Theme%20-%20Flatland
  - Babel syntax: https://packagecontrol.io/packages/Babel
  - SublimeLinter: https://packagecontrol.io/packages/SublimeLinter
  - SideBarEnhancements: https://packagecontrol.io/packages/SideBarEnhancements
- Configure user preferences:
	```
	{
		"color_scheme": "Packages/User/SublimeLinter/Flatland Dark (SL).tmTheme",
		"font_face": "Input Mono",
		"font_size": 12,
		"ignored_packages":
		[
			"CSS"
		],
		"tab_size": 2,
		"theme": "Flatland Dark.sublime-theme",
		"translate_tabs_to_spaces": true
	}
	```
